FWEULER Struct Reference
[Common Data Types]

import "common.idl";

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Common Euler transformation data type Represents a rotation as a combination of the following three rotations: 1st: roll(z); 2nd: pitch(x); 3rd: yaw(y).

Definition at line 311 of file common.idl.

Public Attributes

FWDOUBLE yaw
 rotation yaw (Y)value; third of the yaw-pitch-roll transformations

FWDOUBLE pitch
 pitch (X) value; second of the yaw-pitch-roll transformations

FWDOUBLE roll
 roll (Z) value; first of the yaw-pitch-roll transformations
